content.p: Achieving your degree and graduating from university is a cause for celebration, you’ve secured a valuable qualification and gained a huge amount of experience, but we know that leaving education for the world of work can also be a bit mind-boggling. After all, there’s so much to think about. Advice on choosing the career for you, vacancy sources and making applications Advice on how to thrive at work from day one to beyond those first few weeks Advice on things to consider if you're thinking about making a change As an alumnus of the University, we're still here to help you build your career Join Nottingham's 320,000 strong alumni community around the world Attend our careers fairs, employer recruitment events and job-hunting workshops Explore the careers advice seminars with UoN alumni Read career stories on our blog Like us on Instagram Statement of Service telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
